{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Nitrogen6 VM |caption2 = Embedded Single Board Computer |pp = https://boundarydevices.com/product/nitrogen6-vm/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Boundary_Devices_Nitrogen6_VM |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Boundary Devices |model = Nitrogen |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 6 VM |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Freescale (NXP);i.MX6S;MCIMX6S5DVM10B; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 GHz -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q16CSIG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = eMMC, SD Card |fla2chip = Kingston;EMMC04G-M627; |flash2size = 4 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Kingston;D2516EC4BXGGB; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Micrel;KSZ9021RN; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:19:B8
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2018.07;; |stockos = Linux;4.9.11;Debian;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 10-pad header,, J47
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = SD Card slot, LVDS, RTC w/ battery backup, Audio out (3.5mm), UART, GPIO, I2C, |addchip = 2.1W Stereo Audio Power Amplifier;TI;TPA2012D2;;1;,,, Low Power Stereo Codec;Freescale Semiconductor;SGTL5000;;1;,,, Resistive Touch Screen Controller;Microchip;AR1021-I/SS;;1;,,, 3-5.5V Dual RS-232 Driver and Receiver;STMicro;ST3232C;;2;,,, Real Time Clock Module w/ I2C-Bus;Micro Crystal;RV-4162-C7;;1;,,, White LED Driver w/ Digital and PWM Brightness Control;TI;TPS61161;;1;,,, Fixed Current-Limiting Power-Distribution Switch;ON Semi;NCP382;;1;,,, 8-Bit Bidirectional Level-Shifting Voltage Translator;TI;TXS0108E;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz PWM Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT8010;;1;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Linear Regulator w/ Enable;BCD Semi;AP2114;;1;,,, Programmable-Delay Supervisory Circuit;TI;TPS3808;;1;,,, Octal Buffer and Line Driver;NXP;SN74LVC244A;;1;,,, 4A, 2MHz Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8070;;3;,,, 3A High Side Load Switch;Micrel;MIC94040;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Android 8
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|Boundary Devices Nitrogen6X|List of SBCs}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' i.MX6S Solo (MCIMX6S5DVM10B) :@1GHz Single-core (ARM Cortex-A9) *GPU: ''Vivante'' GC880 / GC320 *RAM: 1GB (DDR3) @400MHz *Storage: 16MB (SPI), 4GB eMMC, SD Card *Video output: Parallel RGB, LVDS *Audio output: Analog via 3.5mm *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB (OTG) *Power: 5V/2A barrel
==See also== :;[https://boundarydevices.com/nitrogen-sbcs-and-soms/ Nitrogen6 Family] *[[Boundary Devices Nitrogen6X]] *[[Boundary Devices Nitrogen6 VM]] *[[Boundary Devices Nitrogen6 Lite]] *[[Boundary Devices Nitrogen6 SoloX]] *[[Boundary Devices Nitrogen6 MAX]] *[[Boundary Devices Nitrogen6 SOM]] *[[Boundary Devices Nitrogen6 SOM V2]] *[[Boundary Devices BD-SL-i.MX6]]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
